fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ask for food, alerting all player the following day. Whoever pings the host in their channel first will feed you (1 use)
- Scratch the player who has the most votes (2 uses, day ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every player will be alerted if you are fed, if you are not fed you will die and may instantly kill two players (one during the first night after death, the other during the next). The second player must be the same faction as the first
- If you are fed, you will learn the name of the player that fed you. That player will be dealt an Unstoppable attack at the start of the following day and you convert to their role
- Scratching a player will deal a Basic attack to them if they visited a player and they were not visited, you will die if you use both Scratches
- You cannot feed yourself

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Wins with the last player you killed
